title: Welcome to my website.
text:
Welcome to my website.
I am a PhD student in Economics at the University of Nottingham, with research interests in empirical and theoretical labour economics. Before beginning my doctoral studies, I worked at several international institutions, including the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB), and the Latin American Reserve Fund (FLAR).
